title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 43-2.12 - Appeals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 43-2.12 - Appeals

State Regulations
(a) An applicant may request a reconsideration of an adverse decision within 60 days of a decision. (b) The department shall review any additional submissions and issue a written decision within 30 days of an applicant's request and submission of additional documents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
43-2.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
